Fighting the Good Fight

27 Nov 2009

Want to eliminate H1N1? Invest in the most expensive, luxurious hand soap you can get your hands on. But two; one for your home bathroom and one for the office. I get my kids to hand wash by getting them excited about the soap; “look, it’s the foamy kind” “ooh pink soap.” Dreamy soap is much more enticing than Life brand antibacterial cleanser and much more likely to spur on action than scary images of flu victims. The same principles apply for all social change initiatives–it’s better to engage people than to scare the crap out of them. Fear leads to paralysis. Engagement, to action.

About us

Hypenotic is a marketing strategy, design & development firm that chooses to use its powers for good. We’re a certified founding member of B Corp in Canada, and if you don’t know what that is, it’s time you do. Since ’98, we’ve helped a lot of interesting people do important things. We create relevant communications and useful experiences. Find out more.
